list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: distribute (cards) in an orderly rotation to players for a game or round.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the cards were dealt for the last hand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các thẻ đã được xử lý cho bàn tay cuối cùng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: take part in commercial trading of a particular commodity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: directors were prohibited from dealing in the company's shares
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giám đốc đã bị cấm đối phó với cổ phiếu của công ty

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: take measures concerning (someone or something), especially with the intention of putting something right.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: hopes of an economic recovery were dealt another blow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hy vọng về một sự phục hồi kinh tế đã được xử lý một đòn khác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an agreement entered into by two or more parties for their mutual benefit, especially in a business or political context.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the band signed a major recording deal
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ban nhạc đã ký một thỏa thuận ghi âm lớn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the process of distributing the cards to players in a card game.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: after the deal, players A and B stay out
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sau khi thỏa thuận, người chơi A và B ở lại

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a significant but unspecified amount of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he lost a great deal of blood
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã mất rất nhiều máu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fir or pine wood, especially when sawn into planks of a standard size.
